name: Youber driver
description:
Game made for Ludum dare 42 (Theme: running out of space)

Recent bug fixes (8/15/2018):

- Fixed the minimap, made it less cluttered and easier to use.

- Fixed some performance issues which occur after a while of the game running.

- Fixed the rating system. (It can no longer go into the negatives.)

Follow us on Instagram @firepitgamesofficial or Twitter @FpGamesOfficial for more updates on this project, and any future games to come!

Goal: to deliver as many passengers to their destinations as possible, but your car has limited space! The more cramped your car is, the lower your ratings get, but in order to deliver people on time they sometimes have to share a ride.

To pick someone up, just drive up to them. Their destination will appear as a red square on the minimap at the end of a dotted line which gives you directions.
